simple.name: propAutoLoadScript
simple.description: If non empty, the component will automatically load this script during configure() (le dossier ops est automatiquement ajouté, l'extension est mise par le soft)

simple.name: propAutoLoadStateMachines
simple.description: If non empty, the component will automatically load this state machine during configure() (le dossier fsm-osd est automatiquement ajouté, l'extension est mise par le soft)

simple.name: propEnableLog
simple.description: If set to true the composant is allowed to write in the log file, if set to false it will not log anything. Use it when a component is spamming log and this annoys you

simple.name: propLeftOdometerGain
simple.description: Gain on the left odometer to provide a measure in rad on the wheel axe.

simple.name: propRightOdometerGain
simple.description: Gain on the right odometer to provide a measure in rad on the wheel axe.

simple.name: propLeftSpeedGain
simple.description: Gain on the left motor's speed to provide a command in RPM (from rad/s on the wheel axe) on the motor axe.

simple.name: propRightSpeedGain
simple.description: Gain on the right motor's speed to provide a command in RPM (from rad/s on the wheel axe) on the motor axe.
